taskDescription:
Find the 6th term, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>c</mi>
      <mn>6</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{c_6}</annotation></semantics></math>, of the geometric sequence with <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msub>
      <mi>c</mi>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </msub>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>400</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{c_1} = 400</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>0.25</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">r = 0.25</annotation></semantics></math>.
